title: How Much Does Car Scratch Repair Cost in Rochdale?
excerpt: Wondering how much it costs to fix a car scratch in Rochdale? Here’s what affects the price and how to avoid overpaying.
content:
Car scratches are one of the most common types of damage we see in Rochdale. Whether it’s a supermarket scrape or a parking bump, even small scratches can ruin the look of your vehicle.

So how much does car scratch repair cost in Rochdale?

Average Car Scratch Repair Costs

Here’s a general price guide:

  • Light surface scratch: £150–£300

  • Deep paint scratch: £250–£600

  • Keyed panel repair: £300–£800

The final cost depends on:

  • Depth of damage

  • Panel size

  • Paint colour matching

  • Whether blending is required

Can You Repair It Without Insurance?

Yes. Many customers choose cash repairs instead of claiming insurance. Why?

  • No increase in premiums

  • No excess payment

  • Faster turnaround

  • No paperwork

For small damage, paying directly is often cheaper than claiming.

How to Get an Accurate Quote

The fastest way is to send photos.
Clear images of the damage help us assess:

  • Paint condition

  • Panel alignment

  • Whether filler is needed

If you’re looking for affordable car scratch repair in Rochdale, contact our team for a free estimate.

title: Dent Removal in Rochdale: Paintless vs Traditional Repair Explained
excerpt: Not all dents need repainting. Here’s the difference between paintless dent removal and full body repair in Rochdale.
content:
Dents happen more often than people expect. From door knocks to minor collisions, dents can lower the value of your car.

In Rochdale, we commonly perform two types of dent repair:

1. Paintless Dent Removal (PDR)

Best for:

  • Small dents

  • No paint damage

  • No cracked lacquer

Benefits:

  • Faster repair

  • Lower cost

  • Original paint preserved

Typical cost: £200–£500

2. Traditional Dent Repair

Needed when:

  • Paint is damaged

  • Panel is creased

  • Metal is stretched

This involves:

  • Filling

  • Sanding

  • Repainting

  • Blending

Typical cost: £400–£800

If you're unsure which repair your vehicle needs, send us photos and we’ll advise honestly.
